QuestData.Title: Students No More
QuestData.Description: Those five students - the ones who were looking for the Hidden Master - they went up to the front lines, alone. I'd send Shado-Pan to aid them, but I haven't got any left.$b$bThere's dangerous creatures up there near the wall. If you find those students, make sure that they haven't fallen to any of them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the martial arts students, then help them defeat an Ik'thik Bloodrager, Egg-Matron, Tendon-Slicer, and Fearmonger.
QuestData.RewardText: They can't keep fighting like this forever. Those kids are downright heroic, but I don't want them to die as heroes.$b$bIt's time to throw in the towel.
